urls.title: Birx risks reputation in bid to keep on Trump's good side
urls.description: The taskforce coordinator has tried to walk a diplomatic tightrope – but has failed to speak out against the president’s false claims

entity.name: Yamiche Alcindor

text:
@Yamiche I think that  Dr Birx cares more about Trump's approval then about the health of our society.I think we should applaud Dr Fauci for his remarkable courage and valor and realize that Dr Birx is only concerned with her standing in the Trump administration
